description.raw:
Sometimes I have this problem while compiling:

~~~
CMake Error at /home/chapulina/blueprint_ws/install/share/cmake/ignition-cmake2/cmake2/IgnUtils.cmake:1360 (add_library):
  Target "ignition-fuel_tools3" links to target "YAML::YAML" but the target
  was not found.  Perhaps a find_package() call is missing for an IMPORTED
  target, or an ALIAS target is missing?
Call Stack (most recent call first):
  /home/chapulina/blueprint_ws/install/share/cmake/ignition-cmake2/cmake2/IgnUtils.cmake:931 (_ign_add_library_or_component)
  src/CMakeLists.txt:42 (ign_create_core_library)
~~~

I haven't figured out what exactly causes it, because sometimes the same container manages to compile without issues. Changing to use the target name solves the issue. I believe this is the correct thing to do anyway, since the [target name is not always the same](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake/src/799f9d9140c69e8faf694022e992c02c8bf42b9c/cmake/FindYAML.cmake#lines-40).

With this fix it compiles, but I still have this warning though:

~~~
CMake Warning (dev) at /home/chapulina/blueprint_ws/install/share/cmake/ignition-cmake2/cmake2/IgnUtils.cmake:378 (message):
   -- THIS MESSAGE IS INTENDED FOR IGNITION-FUEL_TOOLS AUTHORS --
      (IF YOU SEE THIS, PLEASE REPORT IT)

  Could not find pkg-config information for YAML.  It was not provided by the
  find-module for the package, nor was it explicitly passed into the call to
  ign_find_package(~).  This is most likely an error in this project's use of
  ign-cmake.
Call Stack (most recent call first):
  CMakeLists.txt:41 (ign_find_package)
This warning is for project developers.  Use -Wno-dev to suppress it.
~~~

  src/CMakeLists.txt:42 (ign_create_core_library)

I haven't figured out what exactly causes it, because sometimes the same container manages to compile without issues. Changing to use the target name solves the issue. I believe this is the correct thing to do anyway, since the target name is not always the same.

With this fix it compiles, but I still have this warning though:

CMake Warning (dev) at /home/chapulina/blueprint_ws/install/share/cmake/ignition-cmake2/cmake2/IgnUtils.cmake:378 (message):

title: Use YAML_TARGET
